TopicTitle: Is there a way to put a solid wall at the end of the runway?

Articles.Content: Cos I was thinking of using it as a drag stripe and need a way to accurately measure top speed and acceleration over a set length.
Make a vessel which is, for all intents and purposes, a solid wall, and park it at the end of the runway? =p

mmm, considering how some of my craft take off I think a permanent solid wall at the end of the runway would be a really bad idea

does F3 work when paused ?
